website_summaries.verdict: Intended to hold two pairs of cross-country skis, this bag's compression straps let you carry the skis more easily by binding them as one unit. Consider padding the bag with your ski clothes.
pros: Holds two pairs of Nordic skis up to 210 centimeters in length
Exterior compression straps keep skis from shifting inside
Padded interior divider protects gear and keeps it organized
Ends are reinforced with high-density polyethylene board
cons: Bag is best suited for Nordic skis

customer_reviews.title: Easily fits 2 pairs of nordic (ie cross country) skis and poles
customer_reviews.text: Nice basic protection for your cross country (nordic) skis and their poles. Easily fit two pair and poles (actually fit 4 pair and two sets of poles). Fit my 206 cm skis in (snug but they fit). Not alot of extra padding, so not really suitable for air travel. Nice heavier guage zipper should go for a bit, and reasonable weight material.
customer_reviews.author: B. Corrigan

customer_reviews.title: Bag shorter than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is advertised as being able to hold two pairs of skiis up to 210 cm/82.5 inches in length. I bought this for two pairs of x-country skiis, one of which is 80 inches long. But the bag is only about 78 inches long. So basically it's a 200 cm bag. I've missed my return window, so I'm stuck with it..
customer_reviews.author: GracieLou731

customer_reviews.title: held 2 pairs of skis and boots
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for carrying cross country skis and worked well, making it much easier to transport 2 pairs of skis and boots.
customer_reviews.author: elemiller

customer_reviews.title: Holds more than we thought!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our Nordic skis. Held two pairs for Nordic skis, 2 sets of poles and 2 sets of boots! Very happy with the purchase. Quality seems good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be exactly what I was looking for. Enough room to keep two sets of XC skis and poles for tallish people to help protect the inside of our SUV while on ski outings. It is not very heavy duty protection (for the skis). I would not recommend this bag as a travel bag for a lot of airport use. The price is right for what I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: jlabel

customer_reviews.title: Designed for Nordic Skis
customer_reviews.text: Bought a "ski" bag previously, but was too short for Nordic Skis. This one is long enough for Nordic Skis. Big enough to hold two skis plus poles.
customer_reviews.author: Meg-Dawg

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: In all honesty, you get what you pay for here. The cinch straps are a huge benefit, as it makes a wobbly dual pair of XC skis into a single rigid transportable item. The separator inside is kinda a joke. What is needed here is some strapping inside so that the padding stays in position to prevent damage to your skis.
customer_reviews.author: Rick W

customer_reviews.title: Fit 2 sets of XC skis (not boots)
customer_reviews.text: Plain and simple bag for two sets of skis and poles. Nothing more/nothing less price is right
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this bag if you want it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this bag if you want it to fit 203cm or 207cm nordic skis. It is NOT 83in (210cm) as it claims. I measure 199cm or 78.5in max and that's being very generous. I have no idea how other reviewers have given it positive points as the bag will NOT fit long classic nordic skis. The product information lies. I returned it immediately after receiving since none of my nordic skis would fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Better than what it was designed for
customer_reviews.text: Actually used this to carry all my drywall levels and wood clamps. Way heavier than skies and this thing held up great while moving. Looks like a pretty good zipper. No frills, but no BS either.
customer_reviews.author: Hair Jordan

customer_reviews.title: what a louse design. only have foam separator in ...
customer_reviews.text: what a louse design. only have foam separator in the middle of bag. no fastening straps for ski or poles. your equipment still got banged inside the bag. what a joke. stingy for $40 bag. sorry you have to buy extra accessories. What a ripped off!!!! Double ski Bag!!!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: works good for that
customer_reviews.text: using to hold a back drop display, works good for that too
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: this simple bag is a great value, and is adequately sturdy and functional
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this simple bag is a great value, and is adequately sturdy and functional. Can pretty easily carry 2 sets of skis & poles--a great concept for carrying cross country skis! One complaint is that it takes some effort to squeeze 210 cm skis inside. The padding doesn't really do anything, but that doesn't seem to matter.
customer_reviews.author: JBS

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, takes a beating
customer_reviews.text: We put skiis in the bag and then put it on top of our Subaru and drive 4 hours. So it takes a bit of a beating but so far the zippers have been solid, no problems with raveling or tears. We are very happy with it and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: nekko925

customer_reviews.title: Double Nordic Ski Bag for my Alpine skies
customer_reviews.text: The may fit two pairs of Nordic skis, but with Alpine Bindings, only one pair fits. The price is good and the quality seems to be good as well. I will update this posting after this weekend if the bag fails in any way. I do not expect that to happen.
customer_reviews.author: J. MacDonlad

customer_reviews.title: Watch the word Nordic... it means cross ...
customer_reviews.text: Watch the word Nordic... it means cross country skis... not downhill. If you have downhill skis you will barely fit one pair.
customer_reviews.author: kart97

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Easily holds two pairs of skis and poles.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rye

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag for our skis
customer_reviews.text: We have two adult sets of cross country skis including one over 200cm. Also have a kids set and they all fit in this bag with poles. Perfect. Nice carrying handles as well.
customer_reviews.author: MNPilot

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is durable and works great. May not have major brand name on bag, but equally as good!
customer_reviews.author: Wilber Enterprises

customer_reviews.title: Great Ski Bag
customer_reviews.text: I use this to transport and store two sets of cross country skis and poles. Great value for the money, love how it has a middle divider to keep both sets separate from each other.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn R

customer_reviews.title: Super thin
customer_reviews.text: Not padded at all. Bag is paper thin and divider is inadequate. It is big enough to fit two pair of XC skis. Not disappointed, but I would certainly use additional padding when using this bag for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good for two pairs of cross-country skis and two pair of poles.
customer_reviews.text: Bag is good for two pairs of cross-country skis and two pair of poles. Fabric separator is small to isolate pairs from each other , but helpful. Quick delivery. Everything is as described and expected.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it unless your skies have no bindings and you own no poles
customer_reviews.text: No matter how you try to fit the skies in it, 2 skies will not fit. Maybe they mean 2 skies without bindings? Note - quality of bag naterial is awful.
customer_reviews.author: Q123456

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good value. not very thick fabric, but considering the price a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: 50-something

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Accommodated 2 pairs of 185 mm skate skis & a pair of down hill with poles.
customer_reviews.author: furryoldgrover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Durable. Works great! Easily fits two pair of skis and poles.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product & Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Easily held two sets of nordic skis with poles. Good quality materials and well designed. Cushioned divider worked fine even though its does not extend the entire length of bag.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Kammer

customer_reviews.title: Like it ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good ski bag ... and big enough for my husband's skis. Well made and strong, looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, plenty of room for ski's poles and a few clothing items when travling
customer_reviews.author: Big Ring Rider

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag. Easily holds two sets of back country ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag. Easily holds two sets of back country skis, with poles. One complaint is that after very little use one of the zipper tabs came off.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shumway

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Slow shipping but when it came I was fairly impressed with it. Fabric isn't the highest denier count but I didn't pay for 1000 denier. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TRAVIS SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Cross Country Skiing
customer_reviews.text: When a product does what it is suppose to do. Then i'm happy buying it. Nothing more is needed to say on this great product.
customer_reviews.author: John Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Not a double ski bag
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised as a double ski bag but it didn't even fit one pair of average-sized skis.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: could use straps inside bag to help separate skis
customer_reviews.text: It's a good bag. The only thing inside it to separate 2 pairs of skis is a little pad in the center. Other than that, it makes carting your skis around a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory P. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Decent bag
customer_reviews.text: Good bag and certainly long enough for my skate skis. The materials is thin woven nylon, so if you're looking for something durable to go on an airplane, you might consider another option because there is absolutely no padding in this.. But just to transport/store yourself, this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably priced and perfect for fitting 2 pairs of nordic skis with poles.
customer_reviews.author: Pete M

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than that thought it would be,
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than that thought it would be, but does the job
customer_reviews.author: Tiina O.

customer_reviews.title: NICE!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price - used it last winter and kept my poles and skis manageable
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: A good product for getting durable items through the airport but watch out since it offers little protection. You'll want to add foam padding or a hard-case to carry fragile items. I used it to transport anime props and it pairs well with a standard long-rifle hardened gun case since there's enough give in the fabric to fit such things.
customer_reviews.author: ARN

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag/Price
customer_reviews.text: The design and quality of material of the bag exceeded our expectations. This is a great bag for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Fits only one set!
customer_reviews.text: 2 stars at best. I don't mind the thin material and the fact that the bag is shorter than some skis but not being able to fit two skis is a deal breaker. Will send back..
customer_reviews.author: Kaitirawi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Fits two pairs of skis in easily. Very happy and have had it for a couple of years. That's the true test.
customer_reviews.author: Liesel

customer_reviews.title: liked it
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable price. Does the job. Boot bag would be nice.Like the buckle straps to prevent shifting and potential damage to skiis
customer_reviews.author: gg

product_meta.title: High Sierra Double Nordic Ski Travel Bag with Water Resistant Coating and Quick Release Compression Straps - Holds Two Pairs of Skis of up to 210 cm
feature_bullets: CONVENIENT - Main compartment with U-shaped opening holds a single pair of Nordic skis
PROTECTIVE - Center of bag is padded to protect bindings
ADJUSTABLE - Quick-release adjustable compression straps on each end.
MULTI-FUNCTIONAL - Long webbing handles can be used as a shoulder strap.
COMFORTABLE - Extra large handle is padded for comfort.
